author: Joe Morgenstern
title: Oscar Ballot 2017: Predict Who Will Win - WSJ
text:
@JoeMorgenstern Updated Feb. 23, 2017 11:07 a.m. ET 
This year, Wall Street Journal film critic Joe Morgenstern’s picks for who should win an Academy Award largely line up with his predictions for who will win. See his choices (marked with red and purple icons) for key contests, and make your own. Best Picture 
Will Win and Should Win: “La La Land” 
Beware of sure things, but “La La Land” sure looks sure, despite the inevitable backlash of naysayers who insist it’s nowhere near... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
